snippet: James signed his two-year contract with the Cavaliers. James agreed to the $47 million deal, which includes a player option for the 2016-17 season, on Thursday.
abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers forward LeBron James signs two-year, $47 million contract with team.
lead_paragraph: James signed his two-year contract with the Cavaliers. James agreed to the $47 million deal, which includes a player option for the 2016-17 season, on Thursday.
